Detailed Description

Interface used to configure the scale widget, i.e. the bar that shows the current scale of the map in distance units (ex. kilometers or miles).

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum WFAPI::ScaleConfigInterface::ScaleAlignment

Alignment to use for the scale.

Enumerator:
LEFTALIGNMENT  Left alignment of the scale. Scale grows from left to right.
RIGHTALIGNMENT  Right alignment of the scale. Scale grows from right to left.
